Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 110th overall pick, by Chicago (N) in 2006...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Baltimore on 5/23/2010 (Going to CHN: P J. Papelbon, DH K. Reese, P J. Hammel, RF T. Gillies. Going to BAL: P J. Kelly, P G. Richards, 3B M. Grissom Jr., C L. Scott)..
.
Injured on 5/22/2013 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/12/2015, off Jeff Niemann (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/9/2018, off Matt Garza (OAK)...
Released by Baltimore on 6/16/2020...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 6/16/2020 to a 1-year deal worth $488,000 per year...
Injured on 5/2/2021 with a Scratched Cornea Eye, out for 1-2 weeks...
Hit for the cycle against Houston on 9/27/2022...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/20/2024, hitting .545 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/14/2025 to a 1-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
